Title: Requires the department of health to enter into a contract for the digitalization and indexing of certain vital records
Summary: Requires the department of health to enter into a contract with an entity experienced in maintaining genealogical research databases for the digitalization and indexing of certain vital records.
LawCode: Add ยง4180, amd ยง4174, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to requiring the department of health to enter into a contract for the digitalization and indexing of certain vital records
